title: Watch CONVERGE Rip Through New Track "W.W.N.T.S." Live
description: They were never the same. The post Watch CONVERGE Rip Through New Track "W.W.N.T.S." Live appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 9 hours ago
text: Converge has been out on the road ripping through some classics while also introducing fans to new songs from their currently-unannounced new album. Footage of one song called "W.W.N.T.S." has surfaced, which I'm assuming stands for "we were never the same" considering that's one of the lyrics repeated throughout the track. All we know is that Converge has roughly 27 new songs, though it's not clear how many of them were recorded, and how many of that crop made it to the new record. I guess we'll find out soon enough. The above footage was filmed during Converge's May 10 show at the Lincoln Factory in Detroit, MI. The full show was: "Eagles Become Vultures" "Dark Horse" "Under Duress" "W.W.N.T.S." (New song) "All We Love We Leave Behind" "Predatory Glow" "Hell to Pay" "Doom in Bloom" (New song, live debut) "Reap What You Sow" "Cutter" "Worms Will Feed/Rats Will Feast" "First Light" "Last Light" "Wolverine Blues" (Entombed cover) "I Can Tell You About Pain" "Concubine" Converge's remaining tour dates are as follows: 6/14 Brooklyn, NY The Brooklyn Monarch (w/ Cave In, Ensign, Deadguy, etc.)6/15 Providence, RI Alchemy7/25 Indianapolis, IN Post. Festival 2025 (w/ Cave In, Bongripper & Emma Ruth Rundle)7/26 Mountain, CO Unhinged Fest 20257/27 Cut Bank, MT Fire In The Mountains 202510/5 Princeton, AL Furnace Fest 2025 Want More Metal? html:
Converge has been out on the road ripping through some classics while also introducing fans to new songs from their currently-unannounced new album. Footage of one song called "W.W.N.T.S." has surfaced, which I'm assuming stands for "we were never the same" considering that's one of the lyrics repeated throughout the track.

All we know is that Converge has roughly 27 new songs, though it's not clear how many of them were recorded, and how many of that crop made it to the new record. I guess we'll find out soon enough. The above footage was filmed during Converge's May 10 show at the Lincoln Factory in Detroit, MI. The full show was:

  1. "Eagles Become Vultures"
  2. "Dark Horse"
  3. "Under Duress"
  4. "W.W.N.T.S." (New song)
  5. "All We Love We Leave Behind"
  6. "Predatory Glow"
  7. "Hell to Pay"
  8. "Doom in Bloom" (New song, live debut)
  9. "Reap What You Sow"
  10. "Cutter"
  11. "Worms Will Feed/Rats Will Feast"
  12. "First Light"
  13. "Last Light"
  14. "Wolverine Blues" (Entombed cover)
  15. "I Can Tell You About Pain"
  16. "Concubine"

Converge's remaining tour dates are as follows:

6/14 Brooklyn, NY The Brooklyn Monarch (w/ Cave In, Ensign, Deadguy, etc.)
6/15 Providence, RI Alchemy
7/25 Indianapolis, IN Post. Festival 2025 (w/ Cave In, Bongripper & Emma Ruth Rundle)
7/26 Mountain, CO Unhinged Fest 2025
7/27 Cut Bank, MT Fire In The Mountains 2025
10/5 Princeton, AL Furnace Fest 2025
